fields.name: Unholy Revelation (C1)
fields.value: When Rosaria deals a CRIT Hit, her ATK SPD increases by 10% and her Normal Attack DMG increases by 10% for 4s.

fields.name: Land Without Promise (C2)
fields.value: The duration of the Ice Lance created by Rites of Termination is increased by 4s.

fields.name: The Wages of Sin (C3)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Ravaging Confession by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Painful Grace (C4)
fields.value:
Ravaging Confession's CRIT Hits regenerate 5 Energy for Rosaria.
Can only be triggered once each time Ravaging Confession is cast.

fields.name: Last Rites (C5)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Rites of Termination by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Divine Retribution (C6)
fields.value: Rites of Termination's attack decreases opponents' Physical RES by 20% for 10s.
